name: Planet Hero
description:
Protect the planet p-218 from incoming meteors and alien attacks

every hit increases the planet's size until it explodes

but your ship is made from so strong material it can withstand blasts from meteors or laser and can be used to ram into enemies to destroy them

Controls

W: foward

A & D: turn

Shift: dash

Control: Shield

Mouse 1: energy blast
